column1: Kata Robata////We ordered a couple of items off the happy hour menu (kobe beef tacos and pork belly buns)
column2: some sashimi as well as the Spicy Soy Ramen. The ramen is pretty darn good - the broth is made with soy milk
column3: which I've never had in any of my ramen before
column4: and it gives it a light creaminess.
